      • threshold

        public static int threshold
        The threshold which means the max distance between non-equal pixels. Could be changed according size and requirements to the image.

      • isDifferent

        public static boolean isDifferent​(int rgb1,
                                  int rgb2)
        Says if the two pixels equal or not. The rule is the difference between two pixels need to be more then 10%.
        Parameters:
        rgb1 - the RGB value of the Pixel of the Image1.
        rgb2 - the RGB value of the Pixel of the Image2.
        Returns:
        true if they' are difference, false otherwise.

        Save image to the provided path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the saving image.
        image - the BufferedImage object of this specific image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong
